title: Resenha Cronológica do Jornalismo Madeirense
body: This is the title of a work, organized in 1908 under the direction of the late João Eleuterio Martins, which mentions all the Madeiran newspapers that had appeared until then, with the years of publication, their duration, and the number of issues. This work was based on the very important newspaper collections acquired by Eleuterio Martins himself, which are now the property of the _Diário de Noticias_ company.

1908: João Eleuterio Martins organized the work
